AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hugo Benavides: United States Border Patrol Agent who questioned Defendant at the Border Patrol station and was informed about the smuggling suspicions before making contact with Ignacio Rodriguez
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent who encountered suspicious vehicles on FM 2050, including a white sedan and a black truck, and radioed for backup
Defendant in the case who had his vehicle stopped by a United States Border Patrol agent, driver of the white sedan, and was arrested
Defendant stopped by Officer Reyes, driver of the black truck, exhibited nervous behavior during the stop, claimed the vehicle belonged to his aunt and then his cousin, transported to a checkpoint for further questioning, contends that Officer Reyes exceeded the scope of a traffic stop, subject to an 'unlawful arrest' without probable cause, and was traveling to Dallas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRI: Defendants indicted for transporting undocumented aliens within the United States, stopped near the Mexico border, with vehicles riding in tandem
